item.title: favicons
item.description: favicon 2022 update: I now use SVG emoji. View the page source to see. I need an icon, favicon, etc.

item.title: using custom fonts in a web page
item.description: fonts 2022 update: now I just use system fonts. Cf. https://endtimes.dev/why-your-website-should-be-under-14kb-in-size/ TL;DR: add your own fonts by referring to them in style.
